p: As life expectancy and quality of life among persons with HIV improves due to the ART roll out, NCD co-morbidity is expected to increase, necessitating better integration between these vertical health systems [ 2, 3]. HIV/NCD co-morbidity is associated with increasing complexity in the management of comorbid diseases due to disease-drug and drug-drug interactions [ 28]. These interactions make access by clinicians to comprehensive information about patients necessary to inform care and decision-making.
